[Page Title: Charlotte's Wine Bar]

Home Wine Menu Food Menu Events Reservations 
Sip, Savor, Stay Awhile.
Sip, Savor, Stay Awhile. Sip, Savor, Stay Awhile. Follow us on social for updates. 
A Southern pace, a perfect pour.
Enjoy a rotating selection of hand-picked wines paired with chef-crafted small plates designed for sharing, lingering, and connecting. Whether you’re stopping in for happy hour or settling in for an unhurried evening with friends, Charlotte’s offers a warm, inviting space to sip, savor, and stay awhile. Welcome to Charlotte’s Wine Bar & Tapas — a Mount Pleasant retreat where every pour and plate is meant to be savored at a Southern pace. 
Charlotte's Wine Bar and Tapas

320 W. Coleman Boulevard, Mount Pleasant, SC, USA
(843) 936-2127 
Hours

Open today
04:00 pm – 12:00 am Open until 12 AM Monday through Saturday or until the last pour! Quick Pours Happy Hour • Monday - Friday 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM Small Bites Happy Hour • Monday - Friday 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM Get directions Contact Us 
Drop us a line!

[Page Title: Food Menu | Charlotte's Wine Bar]

Home Wine Menu Food Menu Events Reservations Charlotte’s features a selection of shareable small plates, oven-fired tapas, artisan flatbreads, and crafted boards designed to pair beautifully with our curated wines. Each dish highlights quality ingredients and simple, elegant flavor. Food Menu Copyright © 2026 Charlotte's Wine Bar - All Rights Reserved.
